messages.subject: Re:evolution/creation ect. Darwin
messages.msgSnippet: A few years ago, Julian took a course at Harvard Extension called Evolution and Society, and we all learned tons. Yeah, Darwin was a product of his times, and
messages.messageBody:
A few years ago, Julian took a course at Harvard Extension called Evolution
and Society, and we all learned tons. Yeah, Darwin was a product of his times,
and there are things he said that were sexist and racist by our definitions.
Particularly on the racism part, though, he also had some pretty enlightened
views for his time. One of Julian's papers for the class, actually, was "Was
Darwin Racist?"

Would your daughter have any interest in talking via e-mail or otherwise
with Julian? Certainly not to change her mind, but just because she might be
interested? Are you folks going to be at Live and Learn?

Kathryn
